original_text: When they arrived there, the soldiers fixed Jesus to the cross. They put two other men on crosses near to him. They were on each side of him and Jesus was between them.
korean_text: 그들이 거기서 예수를 십자가에 못 박을새 다른 두 사람도 그와 함께 좌우편에 못 박으니 예수는 가운데 있더라

sentences.original_text: the soldiers fixed Jesus to the cross
They put two other men on crosses
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다른 두 사람을 십자가에 올렸다

sentences.original_text: They were on each side of him
